# FluentMobileElement.GetAttribute Method 
 

Gets the value for the given attribute

**Namespace:**&nbsp;<a href="#/MAQS_4/Appium_AUTOGENERATED/Magenic-MaqsFramework-BaseAppiumTest_Namespace">Magenic.MaqsFramework.BaseAppiumTest</a><br />**Assembly:**&nbsp;Magenic.MaqsFramework.BaseAppiumTest (in Magenic.MaqsFramework.BaseAppiumTest.dll) Version: 4.0.4.0 (4.0.4)

## Syntax

**C#**<br />
``` C#
public string GetAttribute(
	string attributeName
)
```


#### Parameters
&nbsp;<dl><dt>attributeName</dt><dd>Type: <a href="http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf" target="_blank">System.String</a><br />The given attribute name</dd></dl>

#### Return Value
Type: <a href="http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf" target="_blank">String</a><br />The attribute value

## Examples

**C#**<br />
``` C#
[TestMethod]
[TestCategory(TestCategories.Selenium)]
public void FluentElementGetAttribute()
{
    Assert.AreEqual("Disabled", this.DisabledItem.GetAttribute("value"));
}
```
